sn3.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn3.1:1.3: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn3.1:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.1:1.5: “bhavampi no gotamo anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti patijanati”ti?
sn3.1:1.6: “Yanhi tam, maharaja, samma vadamano vadeyya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti, mameva tam samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn3.1:2.1: “Yepi te, bho gotama, samanabrahmana sanghino ganino ganacariya nata yasassino titthakara sadhusammata bahujanassa, seyyathidam—
sn3.1:2.2: purano kassapo, makkhali gosalo, nigantho nataputto, sancayo belatthaputto, pakudho kaccayano, ajito kesakambalo;
sn3.1:2.3: tepi maya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti patijanatha’ti puttha samana anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti na patijananti.
sn3.1:2.4: Kim pana bhavam gotamo daharo ceva jatiya navo ca pabbajjaya”ti?
sn3.1:3.1: “Cattaro kho me, maharaja, daharati na unnatabba, daharati na paribhotabba.
sn3.1:3.3: Khattiyo kho, maharaja, daharoti na unnatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.4: Urago kho, maharaja, daharoti na unnatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.5: Aggi kho, maharaja, daharoti na unnatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.6: Bhikkhu, kho, maharaja, daharoti na unnatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.7: Ime kho, maharaja, cattaro daharati na unnatabba, daharati na paribhotabba”ti.
sn3.1:4.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
sn3.1:14.1: Evam vutte, raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.1:14.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn3.1:14.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn3.1:14.5: Upasakam mam, bhante, bhagava dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
